Keyword: MATHMATHMATH

Now, we will subtract the keyword letters from the encrypted message letters (mod 26) to get the original plaintext.

3. Z - T = (25 - 19) mod 26 = 6 => G

6. D - A = (3 - 0) mod 26 = 3 => D
7. M - T = (12 - 19) mod 26 = 25 => Z

10. P - A = (15 - 0) mod 26 = 15 => P
